pr_title: [NETBEANS-3957] fixed "opened documents list" show HTML code instead of rich text

timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-3957] fixed "opened documents list" show HTML code instead of rich text

tested with FlatLaf light/dark, Windows, Nimbus and Metal LaFs

timeline.bodyText: I think this could be improved if lbl would be declared to be a  JComponent. Most calls will still work, and the cases where that is not the case (calls to setIcon/setText) are already null protected and could just as well be protected with if lbl instanceof JLabel) and only cast at that point.
timeline.author: matthiasblaesing

replies.bodyText: Ignore this - it is not cleaner, the return of HtmlRenderer#createRenderer does not allow this.
replies.author: matthiasblaesing
